NSW expects Covid hospitalisations to peak next week. These key charts will show if that’s happening


by Nick Evershed and Josh Nicholas

14 January 2022


NSW Health also released an update to its previously released modelling, which shows how hospitalisation figures have been tracking against different possible scenarios.


Currently, the actual numbers are below the best-case scenario included in the modelling document:


Pearce emphasised that despite the encouraging numbers, hospitals would still be under significant pressure for the near future.
